source_sentence: It acts as a lid, trapping all our weather below.

target_sentence: في فقط بضعة لحظات مميتة ,

source_sentence: Wooh!

source_sentence: The doldrums are basically a narrow strip of complete calm, five to ten degrees either side of the equator.
target_sentence: الكساد أساساً شريط ضيّق مِنْ الهدوءِ الكاملِ , خمسة إلى عشْرة درجاتِ أي من جانبي خط الإستواء.

source_sentence: The intense energy of the sun heats the air, which rises in huge columns, sucking in powerful surface winds from north and south.
target_sentence: الطاقة الحادّة للشمسِ تُسخّنُ الهواءَ , الذي يَرتفعُ في الأعمدةِ الضخمةِ , مصّ في الرياحِ السطحيّةِ القويَّةِ مِنْ الشمالِ والجنوبِ.

source_sentence: The only movement of air is up, so the areas underneath remain calm and windless.

source_sentence: To follow the start of the wind's journey, follow this.

source_sentence: from the icy blasts of an Arctic morning and the cooling breeze of a summer day.
